cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.subtitle: Last updated: April 20, 2025
cookies.introduction: At Reviu, we use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our site and applications. This cookies policy explains how and why we use these technologies and the choices available to you.

what.title: 1. What is a cookie?
what.content: A cookie is a small text file that a website saves on your computer or mobile device when you visit the site. It enables the website to remember your actions and preferences (such as language, font size, and other display settings) over a period of time, so you don't have to keep re-entering them whenever you come back to the site or browse from one page to another.

types.title: 2. Types of cookies we use
types.content: We use different types of cookies for various reasons:
types.essentialDesc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable you to navigate around the site and use its features, such as accessing secure areas. Without these cookies, services you have asked for, such as access to your account, cannot be provided.
types.preferencesDesc: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you have made (such as your username, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features.
types.analyticsDesc: These cookies collect information about how you use a website, for example which pages you visit most often and if you receive error messages. They help us understand how visitors interact with the site, which allows us to improve how it functions.
types.marketingDesc: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third-party advertisers.

thirdParty.title: 3. Third-party cookies
thirdParty.content1: In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-party technologies to enhance your experience and our services. These technologies may include:
thirdParty.item1: Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the site.
thirdParty.item2: Social networks like Facebook and Twitter, which might use cookies on our site for personalization and advertising.
thirdParty.item3: Advertising partners who might use cookies to collect information about your activities on our site and other sites to provide you with targeted advertising.
thirdParty.content2: These third-party services have their own privacy policies and may use the information collected for their own purposes.

control.title: 4. How to control cookies
control.content1: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your device and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed. If you do this, however, you may have to manually adjust some preferences every time you visit a site, and some services and functionalities may not work.
control.content2: You can usually modify your browser settings to decline cookies. Here's how to do it in different browsers:
control.chrome: Menu > Settings > Show advanced settings > Privacy > Content settings > Cookies
control.firefox: Menu > Options > Privacy & Security > History > Custom settings > Cookies
control.safari: Preferences > Privacy > Cookies and website data

updates.title: 5. Updates to our cookies policy
updates.content: We may update this cookies policy from time to time to reflect, for example, changes to the cookies we use or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please therefore revisit this policy regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies and related technologies.
updates.content2: The date at the top of this policy indicates when it was last updated.
